name: UIViewControllerTransitioningDelegate
desc: A set of methods that vend objects used to manage a fixed-length or interactive transition between view controllers.

items.name: func animationController(forPresented: UIViewController, presenting: UIViewController, source: UIViewController) -> UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning?
items.desc: Asks your delegate for the transition animator object to use when presenting a view controller.

items.name: func animationController(forDismissed: UIViewController) -> UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning?
items.desc: Asks your delegate for the transition animator object to use when dismissing a view controller.

items.name: func interactionControllerForPresentation(using: UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning) -> UIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning?
items.desc: Asks your delegate for the interactive animator object to use when presenting a view controller.

items.name: func interactionControllerForDismissal(using: UIViewControllerAnimatedTransitioning) -> UIViewControllerInteractiveTransitioning?
items.desc: Asks your delegate for the interactive animator object to use when dismissing a view controller.

items.name: func presentationController(forPresented: UIViewController, presenting: UIViewController?, source: UIViewController) -> UIPresentationController?
items.desc: Asks your delegate for the custom presentation controller to use for managing the view hierarchy when presenting a view controller.
